name: Magic Key Terrace - Magic Key Holder Dining
location: Disney California Adventure Park, Performance Corridor

items.title: Meats & Cheeses
items.description: Assortment of Chef-selected Italian Cheeses and Cured Meats

items.title: Arancini
items.description: Butternut Squash Risotto, Butternut Squash Purée, Mornay Sauce, Grated Romano, Basil & Chile Oils and Micro Basil

items.title: Fonduta
items.description: Blend of Cream, Smoked Mozzarella, Fontina and Roasted Garlic, served with Sourdough Crostini, Roasted Potatoes and Spanish Chorizo

items.title: Focaccia
items.description: Served with a Duo of House-made Butters

items.title: Tuscan Soup
items.description: Caramelized Fennel and Leeks, Potatoes, Italian Sausage, Kale, Fennel Pollen and Lemon Leek Oil

items.title: Panzanella
items.description: Heirloom Tomatoes, Prosciutto, Red Onion, Arugula, Burrata, Focaccia Croutons and Citrus Vinaigrette

items.title: Osso Buco
items.description: Braised Pork Shank, Creamy Mozzarella Polenta, Grilled Broccolini, Gremolata and Focaccia Sand

items.title: Pork Milanese Al Marsala
items.description: Breaded Bone-in Pork Chop served with Angel Hair, Marsala Sauce and Roasted Mushrooms, topped with Arugula and Shallots tossed in Lemon Oil

items.title: Roasted Half Chicken
items.description: Lemon-Rosemary-rubbed Chicken, Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes with Caramelized Shallots, Roasted Vegetables and Lemon-Caper Sauce

items.title: Gnocchi
items.description: Spicy Vodka Sauce, Romano Cheese, Micro Basil and Basil Oil

items.title: Bucatini Alle Vongole
items.description: Clams with Pasta, White Wine, Garlic, Parsley, Butter, Lemons and Focaccia Sand

items.title: Side House Salad
items.description: Romaine Lettuce, Green Olives, Sourdough Croutons, Olives, Pepita Seeds and House-made Caesar Dressing

items.title: Orecchiette
items.description: Sautéed Broccolini, Caramelized Onion, Roasted Mushrooms, Sun-dried Tomatoes, Roasted Delicata Squash and Demi-glace

items.title: Pumpkin Cannoli
items.description: Pumpkin Cheesecake Filling with Candied Pepitas, dusted with Cinnamon and Powdered Sugar

items.title: Spumoni Mousse Cake
items.description: Layers of Chocolate Cake, Chocolate Ganache, Cherry Cake, Cherry Jam, Pistachio Cake and Pistachio Mousse, served with Cherry Sauce and Pistachio Crumble

items.title: Slider
items.description: Angus Beef Slider on a Toasted Bun, served with Seasonal Fruit and Yogurt, with choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without Substitutions

items.title: Mac and Cheese
items.description: served with Seasonal Fruit and Yogurt, with choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without Substitutions

items.title: Cheese Pizza
items.description: Served with Seasonal Fruit and Fried Potatoes with choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.title: Avalon Cooler
items.description: J. Vineyards Cuvée, Tito’s Handmade Vodka, St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur, Strawberry Purée and Lemon Juice

items.title: Mint Julep Cocktail
items.description: Old Forester Bourbon, Apricot Liquor, Agave, Lemon Juice and Soda Water with a Sprig of Mint

items.title: Millionaire’s Manhattan
items.description: Old Forester Bourbon, MacMurray Estate Pinot Noir, Simple Syrup and Charred Cinnamon Stick

items.title: Shipwreck
items.description: Bacardi Rum, Giffard's Passion Fruit Liqueur, Orgeat, Coconut Milk and Lime Juice topped with Myers's Dark Rum and Aromatic Bitters
Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum, Bols Blue Curaçao, Coconut-Pineapple Cream and fresh Lime Juice

items.title: Drop In... If you Dare
items.description: Hendrick's Gin, St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur, fresh Lemon Juice served with Maraschino Cherry Mix

items.title: Conestoga Cocktail
items.description: Del Maguey Vida Mezcal, Topo Chico® Mineral Water, Lime Juice and Finest Call Prickly Pear Syrup

items.title: Mulholland Mule
items.description: Jameson Irish Whiskey and Lime Juice topped with Ginger Beer

items.title: Pozione Verde
items.description: Midori, Coconut Rum, Coconut Cream and Pineapple Juice

items.title: Lime Thyme
items.description: Limoncello, Tanqueray Gin, Lime Juice, Thyme and Sparkling Water

items.title: La Rinascita
items.description: Bombay Sapphire Gin, Campari, Pineapple Juice, Orgeat Syrup and Lemon Juice

items.title: Hazelnut Affogato Cocktail
items.description: Frangelico, Espresso and Vanilla Ice Cream, topped with Chocolate

items.title: Amalfi Sunset Paloma
items.description: Tequila, Watermelon Juice, Agave and Lemon Juice

items.title: Boulevardier
items.description: Campari, Dolin Sweet Vermouth and Old Forester Bourbon

items.title: Aperol Spritz Flight
items.description: Aperol Spritz, Limoncello Spritz, Elderflower Spritz

items.title: Garibaldi
items.description: Aperol and Blood Orange Juice

items.title: Bicicletta
items.description: Pinot Grigio and Campari topped with Sparkling Water

items.title: Trattoria Aperitivo
items.description: Cappelletti Aperitivo, Storyhouse California Dry Gin and Lemon Juice

items.title: Lemon Basil Spritz
items.description: Limoncello, Absolut Citron, Prosecco, Lemon Juice and Fresh Basil

items.title: Amaro Rinfrescante
items.description: Amaro Averna Liqueur topped with Sparkling Mineral Water and a splash of Lemon Juice

items.title: Aperol Spritz
items.description: Aperol and La Marca Prosecco topped with Soda Water

items.description: Napa Valley

items.description: Napa County and Sonoma County

items.description: Piedmonte, Italy

items.description: San Diego, CA (6.5% ABV)

items.description: Orange, CA (5.0% ABV)

items.description: Anaheim, CA (ABV 5.8%)

items.title: Heimlich Chew Chew Juice (Non-Alcoholic)
items.description: Minute Maid® Lemonade with Granny Smith Apple Syrup and fresh Watermelon
